// Email validation
(?i)^[a-z0-9._%+-]+@[a-z0-9.-]+\.[a-z]{2,}$

// Number parsing
^(?:\+|-)?\d+(?:\.\d+)?(?:[eE](?:\+|-)?\d+)?$

// Date parsing
^(?P<year>\d{4})-(?P<month>\d{2})-(?P<day>\d{2})$

// Quote matching
(?P<quote>['"]).*?(?P=quote)

// Word boundaries
\b\w+\b

// Whitespace between numbers
(?<=\d)\s+(?=\d)

// Nested constructs
(?:(?P<name>\w+)\s+(?P=name))
(?i:(?P<word>\w+).*\1)
